block.p: BEIL-Lawrence. On May 25, 2000. Devoted husband of Carole Brinker Beil. Beloved father of Barry and Judi, Norman and Carol, Susan, Christopher and Randi Rose, Jonathan Rose, Mark Brinker and David Brinker. Loving brother ofSheldon and Barbara, Audrey and Edward. Adored grandfather of Elizabeth and Jonathan, Jeffrey, Jacob and Charlie, Garrett and Henry, Adrienne and Alex. He was an extraordinary man whose infectious love of life was felt by all who knew him. We miss him. Services ''Boulevard-Riverside'', 1450 Broadway, Hewlett, Long Island, 1:30PM on Sunday
BEIL-Lawrence Mitchell. My cherised brother, friend, confidant and partner in Sheldon Electric. His council, concern and intelligence and compassion will be deeply missed. Barbara and Shelley Beil.
BEIL-Lawrence. Adored grandfather. He taught us what it means to be loved. We will miss him. Elizabeth and Jonathan, Jeffrey, Alex, Adrienne, Jacob, Garrett, Charley, and Henry
